partial_orders.reason: Both edits perform an identical textual substitution (changing 'version': '0.1' to 'version': '1.0') on the same type of syntactic construct (version field in manifest files). This appears to be part of a single, contiguous version bump operation across multiple addon manifest files. The edits target the exact same structural element (version field) with the identical before→after pattern, making this a clear case of bulk-edit synchronization where either edit could be made first and would naturally prompt the other as part of the same refactoring sweep.
